sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Order success">5e177aeb1e132110a598a48a4d78bb46</macroponent> <name>confirmation_message_1_caption</name> <preset/> <required_translations>[ { "code" : null, "message" : "Reference Number : ", "comment" : "" } ]</required_translations> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.imports */ function evaluateProperty({ api, helpers }) { const label = helpers.translateSync("Reference Number : ") return `${label} ${api.state.successNumber}`; }]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-14 11:48:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>56177aebc213211038c931080ff7f445</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>confirmation_message_1_caption</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Finder" source="x_350851_flow_fi_0">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Flow Finder">18d672eb97132110974bbf1e6253afc8</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_56177aebc213211038c931080ff7f445</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-14 11:48:10</sys_updated_on> <target/> <type>transform</type> </sys_ux_client_script> </record_update>
